articles.title: Physicists Finally Confirm Einstein's Stunning Prediction About Black Holes - ScienceAlert
articles.description: The detailed mechanics of how matter falls down onto a black hole from outside the event horizon have been revealed in a new paper.
articles.content:
The detailed mechanics of how matter falls down onto a black hole from outside the event horizon have been revealed in a new paper.
